item.title: How to properly interpret p-value?
item.description: Understanding p-value, hypothesis testing and significance level with the experiment “lady tasting tea”.

item.title: How to interpret a boxplot
item.description: If you are in academia or work with data analysis, you have probably encountered a somewhat peculiar-looking plot such as the above (based on the research article of Schenk & Steppan (2014)).

item.title: About
item.description: Hi! I am Fernanda I am a data analyst with a background in biomedical sciences. I am from Brazil and I am also an R-Lady.
